trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_SEQ_00<tab>The salvaging goblin is at a complete loss as to how to handle the great morbols.

TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_SEQ_01<tab>A salvaging goblin has asked for your help in dealing with the great morbols that interfere with his work. Preventing them from breeding seems to be the best idea, so he asks you to slay three great morbol seedlings. Unfortunately, these slippery little creatures rarely come out of hiding. However, they love fish, and can be lured from hiding by using fish as bait. Feltsmox also loves fish─she is always fishing. Perhaps she can provide some to use as bait. Find her and ask her.

TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_SEQ_02<tab>You find Feltsmox and she agrees to cooperate. Unfortunately, she still has had no luck in catching any fish whatsoever. But hope is not lost. She assures you that morbol seedlings are not discerning eaters. They can be just as easily lured from hiding with fishing bait as they can with the fish themselves. Meet with her at Saint Mocianne's Arboretum and put her plan to the test.

TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_SEQ_03<tab>Just as Feltsmox promised, the great morbol seedlings are quick to emerge when she throws a handful of fishing bait into the water. You make quick work of the seedlings, slaying three of them as requested by the salvaging goblin. Thank Feltsmox for her assistance.

TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_SEQ_04<tab>Feltsmox is happy to be of help, but has mixed feelings about how well her plan worked. After all the trouble she has had in trying to catch fish, she is unsure what to make of the ease with which she caught the morbol seedlings. In any case, the plan was a success. Report back to the salvaging goblin with the good news.
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_SEQ_05<tab>The salvaging goblin is glad that the great morbol seedlings have been thoroughly dealt with. He thanks you for your help, and sets off to thank Feltsmox, too.
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Feltsmox.
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Feltsmox again.
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Feltsmox yet again.
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_TODO_03<tab>Report to the salvaging goblin.
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_FELTSMOX_000_000<tab>Feltsmox keep try, but Feltsmox never catch any fish. What should Feltsmox do?
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_PRIVATEHOUSEGOB01961_000_010<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... You look strong, uplander. Will you help me with something?

TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_PRIVATEHOUSEGOB01961_000_011<tab>I make jinglyshine by search ruins for things to sell. But great morbols stop me! Need to stop them breeding─kill the seedlings. Please kill three morbol seedlings!

TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_PRIVATEHOUSEGOB01961_000_012<tab>Seedlings normally hide. But I have planstrike: they love fish. We can lure them from hiding with fish. But seedlings are sneaky─we must kill all at once. First need fish. Ask Feltsmox. I see her southwise, she always fishing.
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_PRIVATEHOUSEGOB01961_000_020<tab>We need fish to catch great morbol seedlings. Go southwise, ask Feltsmox for fish. She love fishing.
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_FELTSMOX_000_030<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Still no fish... Feltsmox only wish to catch fish─so juicysweet...

TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_FELTSMOX_000_031<tab>You need fish for morbolbait? Morbol eat anything. Not need fish, can just use normal fishingbait. Feltsmox go with you, try now. Come with Feltsmox to Saint Mocianne's Arboretum!
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_PRIVATEHOUSEGOB01961_000_040<tab>Did you ask Feltsmox for hand-lending? We must kill the morbol seedlings!
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_FELTSMOX_000_050<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Feltsmox never try catch morbol before. Start with throw fishingbait in water...
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_PRIVATEHOUSEGOB01961_000_060<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Did Feltsmox give hand-lending? Please thank her for me!
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_FELTSMOX_000_070<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... We caught them! We caught them! ...But Feltsmox cannot catch fish...only morbols? Feltsmox not sure how to feel about this...
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_FELTSMOX_000_071<tab>For now, we killed enough morbols. Return to gobbie who sent you. Tell him we killed great morbol seedlings.
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_FELTSMOX_000_080<tab>Morbols are slain. Return to gobbie who sent you. Tell him great morbol seedlings are slain.
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_PRIVATEHOUSEGOB01961_000_090<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... You have already slain the seedlings? You are a strong uplander! Thank you!
TEXT_HEAVNZ831_01961_PRIVATEHOUSEGOB01961_000_091<tab>Feltsmox truly loves fishing. I must find her and thank her. Perhaps she can teach me to catch fish!
